name: The Shopping Dead (Sakkris)
description:
You were just shopping, when a zombie appocalipse happened, but that won't stop you from getting your groceries! 

Try and survive for as long as you can.

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • Spacebar - Attack
Team - Lunatic Cultists
  • Carlos Dias  - Code 💻
  • Cristóvão Sampaio - Art 🎨 & Music 🎹
  • João Pacheco - Code 💻
